Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component.Input
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component

    public class Input
extends java.lang.Object
implements dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
    An entity controller which responds to keyboard and mouse input.

        Parameters:
